name: Planes on Fire - Rescue Mission!
description:
Planes on Fire - Rescue Mission is an amazing, fly by the seat of your pant mobile app game for you phone or tablet. Planes on Fire is nail biting good fun, extremely addictive and keeps you coming back again and again. Your plane speeds and explore through a challenging maze of fire.

Collect coins and fly as high as you can up into deep space while you avoid the much fire as you can. This is an explosive game and tons of fun. And as an added bonus, if your getting close to a new high score or achieving a difficult mission, use the Save ME! feature to keep you going longer.

This is loads of fun, So what are you waiting for. Download and play Planes on Fire - Rescue Mission
